text:
January 22, 1971

Dr. S. J. Green
British-American Tobacco Company, Ltd.

London $.W. 1, England

Dear Jim:

Enclosed herewith are copies of the January Product Develop-
ment Status Report and the Minutes of the January 8 meeting of

the Product Development Committee.

Sincerely,

J. W. Burgard

md
Enclosures

O94S 477

summary: January 22, 1971: Letter from J. W. Burgard to Jim Green of the British-American Tobacco Company. The letter was sent from London, England. It was addressed to Green at his home in London. In it are the Product Development Committee's January Status Report and the Minutes of a meeting held that day.
